content: > want more beautiful free patterns sign up for our newsletter 2 and follow us on instagram @eweknitto 3 so you never miss a pattern designed by claudia q the coco cardigan is the perfect striped layering piece for your little one a top down circular yoke cardigan made in the fibre co canopy fingering sizes 0-3 mos 3-6 mos 6-12 mos 12-18 mos 2 4 6 8 10 to be worn with approx 2 / 5cm positive ease finished measurements chest circumference 16 18 20 22 24 26 28 30 32 / 40 5 45 5 51 56 61 66 71 76 81 cm body length to underarm at front 3 3 1/2 4 4 1/2 5 1/2 6 6 1/2 7 7 1/2 / 7 5 9 10 11 5 14 15 16 5 18 19 cm sleeve length to underarm 5 3/4 6 7 8 8 1/2 10 11 1/2 13 14 / 14 5 15 18 20 5 21 5 25 5 29 33 35 5 cm upper arm 6 1/2 6 3/4 8 8 1/4 9 10 10 1/2 11 11 1/4 / 16 5 17 20 5 21 23 25 5 26 5 28 28 5 cm yoke depth 3 1/2 4 4 1/2 5 5 5 1/2 6 6 1/2 7 / 9 10 11 5 12 5 12 5 14 15 16 5 18 cm for pattern support patterns@eweknit ca 1 eweknit co 2 https //eweknit-store us7 list-manage com/subscribe/post u=d1440342032269e6f7794a987&id=7952e97f67 3 https //www instagram com/eweknitto/
